verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is the acceptable time.
Today is the day of salvation.
This is the acceptable time.
Today is the day of Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Spirit of the Lord is now upon us.
To open the prison to them that are bound.
He has called us to preach and to proclaim.
The acceptable year of the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now is the time to walk in perfection.
Now is the time to walk without sin.
Now is the time to submit to His workings.
Now is the time to go in.
